name: Bala Kanda
description: The childhood of Lord Rama and his early adventures.

name: Ayodhya Kanda
description: The exile of Lord Rama and his departure from Ayodhya.

name: Aranya Kanda
description: Rama’s journey in the forest and Sita’s abduction.

name: Kishkindha Kanda
description: Rama meets Hanuman and Sugriva; forms an alliance.

name: Sundara Kanda
description: Hanuman’s leap to Lanka and his meeting with Sita.

name: Yuddha Kanda
description: The great battle of Lanka and Rama’s victory.

name: Uttara Kanda
description: Rama’s rule and the conclusion of his divine mission.
